product_summary: Delphos is a virtual composer that learns your music style and helps you create your music faster. It's like having a personal copilot for your music production, helping you write music like a superhuman and create huge sections in seconds.
product_pros: Learns and adapts to your music style
Provides a platform for collaboration with other musicians

product_usecases.use_case: Creating music tracks quickly and efficiently
product_usecases.details: Delphos can generate complete music tracks in seconds, freeing up time for other aspects of music production.
Delphos can provide inspiration and help you break out of creative ruts by generating unexpected and unique musical ideas.
Delphos allows you to train your own soundworld, ensuring that the generated music matches your specific preferences and style.
Delphos provides a platform for real-time collaboration, allowing multiple musicians to work on the same project simultaneously.
Delphos allows you to publish your soundworlds and earn money each time they are used by other musicians.

product_toolfor.details: Delphos is a powerful tool for musicians of all levels, from beginners to professionals.
Delphos can help music producers save time and improve their workflow by automating repetitive tasks.
Delphos can provide songwriters with inspiration and help them overcome writer's block.
Delphos can generate unique and engaging music for DJs to use in their sets.
Delphos can be used as a teaching tool to help students learn about music theory and composition.

product_pricing: Pricing information is not available on the website.
